patch 8.2.1880: Vim9: asan complains about adding zero to NULL

Solution:   Check for argument count first.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/8a99e66b4f7616d9b0b9cefe742f82f9122087d5|patch 8.2.1878: GTK: error for redefining function>
patch 8.2.1878: GTK: error for redefining function

Problem:    GTK: error for redefining function. (Tony Mechelynck)
Solution:   Remove "gtk_" prefix from local functions and prepend "gui_" to
            global functions.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1878: GTK: error for redefining function · vim/vim@8a99e66
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1878: GTK: error for redefining function · vim/vim@8a99e66
attachments.text: Problem: GTK: error for redefining function. (Tony Mechelynck) Solution: Remove "gtk_" prefix from local functions and prepend "gui_" to global functions.

patch 8.2.1876: Vim9: argument types are not checked at compile time

Problem:    Vim9: argument types for builtin functions are not checked at
            compile time.
Solution:   Add an argument type checking mechanism. Implement type checks for
            one function.

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/e9f9f16387554e5b34ba42ce00c42c28dd66af58|patch 8.2.1872: matchfuzzy() does not prefer sequential matches>
patch 8.2.1872: matchfuzzy() does not prefer sequential matches

Problem:    Matchfuzzy() does not prefer sequential matches.
Solution:   Give sequential matches a higher bonus. (Christian Brabandt,
            closes #7140)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1872: matchfuzzy() does not prefer sequential matches · vim/vim@e9f9f16
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1872: matchfuzzy() does not prefer sequential matches · vim/vim@e9f9f16
attachments.text: Problem: Matchfuzzy() does not prefer sequential matches. Solution: Give sequential matches a higher bonus. (Christian Brabandt, closes #7140)
